author: Stephen Watts
description: Perhaps best summarised as being an 'Apple and Grape Margarita, the flavours combine harmoniously in what is a well-balanced drink.
name: Mexican Vineyard
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE 8 grapes in base of shaker
ADD other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and strain into chilled glass
